metadata.title: Senate Chairman Gilani announces 3-member panel of chairpersons

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 10 (APP): Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani on Tuesday announced a three-member panel of chairpersons to conduct the business of the House in the absence of the chairman and deputy chairman. Senator Irfan ul Haq Siddiqui, Senator Manzoor Ahmed and Senator Nasir Abbas, would chair the proceedings of the House in the absence of the chairman and deputy chairman.
